迵迵迵

迵字的基本解释

迵
dòng
通达：“迵风者，饮食下嗌而辄出不留。”

迵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dòng］
［《廣韻》徒弄切，去送，定。］
(1)透；通。参见“迵風”、“迵迵”。
(2)通“同”。

迵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迵； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1255第19
【唐韻】【集韻】?徒弄切，音洞。【廣韻】過也。【史記·倉公傳】診其脈迵風。【註】言風洞徹五臟也。　又【玉篇】徒東切，音同。達也。【揚子·太?經】中㝠獨達，迵迵不屈。【註】中心㝠㝠獨達，故通而不盡。

考證：〔【揚子·太?經】中㝠獨達，迵迵不屈。【註】中心㝠㝠迵達，故通而不盡。〕　謹照原註迵達改獨達。
迵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
迵字的起名意思

通达。

Ye
Basic explanation of words
Ye
dòng
Mastery: "Those who are windy, eat and drink without staying out."
Ye
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dòng］
["Guangyun" just cut it, send it off, set it. ]
(1) Transparent; through. See "迵鿵", "迵迵".
(2) Through "the same".
Ye
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　迵; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1255 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's just cut, sound hole. [Guang Yun] Go too. 【Historical Records·Cang Gongzhuan】Diagnose his pulse and wind. [Note] The wind tunnel is also through the five internal organs.　[Jade Chapter] It’s the same sound. Tatsuya. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】Zhonghe is unique and unyielding. [Note] The center is unique, so it is inexhaustible. Textual research: [[Yangtze·Tai? Scripture] Zhonghe is alone and unyielding. [Note] The center is 㝠㝠 reachable, so it is inexhaustible. 〕　I would like to change the original note to the original.
Ye
